work.title: 我們的60年 - 商業電台經典重溫
work.context: A campaign site to celebrate CR881903 60th anniversary. It is similar to 881903.com 視電台 but without jQuery and Youtube Data API. The site uses HTML5 Video in place of Youtube iframe. Sound files and JSON files are provided by project managers on mount drive. A worker is written to sync media and JSON files. The site gets media file via symbolic links.

work.title: 881903.com 視電台
work.context: A website deeply rely on 881903.com Youtube Channel. No database is involved. The whole application uses Youtube Data API to mimic Youtube interface including get playlist item (video) snippets, statistic (view count, like count). And a heavy implementation of DoubleClick for Publisher (DFP) and Interactive Media Ads (IMA) aiming to earn more revenue

task.title: Youtube Data API
task.context: The application data request was done with PHP at first but it requires quota counts. It changes to using Ajax at the end because no quota limit is set.

task.title: DoubleClick for Publisher (DFP)
task.context: DFP are loaded with lazy load configs later due to project team reported that ad impression did not look good

task.title: Interactive Media Ads (IMA)
task.context: Youtube embed iframe does not provide Google Ads Service. The implementation is to call Youtube Iframe API to initiate the iframe but inserting (on-top-of-video) a pre-roll VAST or VPAID ads before playing the loaded Youtube video.
